testcase.classname: f01_regfeature | user could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed And user select gender type.................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed When user enter email "test@exampless.com" field............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@exampless.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user couldnot login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "INvalid" "test123@exampless.com" and "P3@ssw0rd124"...passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login unsuccessful................................................passed

testcase.classname: user checks the currency of products
testcase.name: user chooses Euro currency then check product prices
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on Euro curreny...........................................passed Then user checks if there Euros or not......................................passed

testcase.name: user searches for products
testcase.system-out: Given user enters search word "book"........................................passed And click search............................................................passed And Url confirms that we are in the search page.............................passed Then the expected result appears............................................passed

testcase.name: user search fo product 2
testcase.system-out: Given user enters search word "AP_MBP_13"...................................passed And click search............................................................passed And Url confirms that we are in the search page.............................passed And user clicks on products appears.........................................passed Then the expected Product appears...........................................passed

testcase.name: User hover to a Category and choose random sub category
testcase.system-out: Given User hover over random main category..................................passed And Select random sub category from main category...........................passed Then we get text of page title to make sure of correct choice...............passed
